pages.text: $(bold)What you need$()$(br)-two Buckets of Milk$(br)$(l:curd_mod:cooking/crafting#stove)-a Sieve $()$(br)-an empty Bottle$(br)$(l:curd_mod:cooking/crafting#curd_pot)-a Curd Pot$()$(br2)First put the milk into the pot and pass the sieve once through the milk. Now you got curd. After that you can fill the byproduct whey into a Bottle. This product is really useful for brewing kefir.
